remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 XSD 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅"XML 数据类型参考"在 MSDN 库中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的成员类之间进行转换对象和 XSD`integer`字符串。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XSD `integer` string.
